summary: The diff updates frontend/index.html to reference a PNG favicon at /assets/generated/favicon-64.png, but it does not add the required favicon-64.png asset under frontend/public, nor does it include any verifiable steps/artifacts for confirming favicon rendering in dev and production. Several unrelated metadata/documentation files were also modified.
